taskDesc: Your task is to boil a substance.  First, focus on a substance that is in solid or liquid form (e.g. 'focus <substanceName>').  Then, make changes to the environment that will cause it to boil.  When the substance changes to a gas state, the score will switch to 1.  To reset, type 'reset task'.
